JobLevelActionUiImpl, SupervisoryActionUiImpl
public abstract class HierarchyPrincipalBasedActionUi
extends ApprovalsBaseActionUi

base class for SupervisoryActionUi and JobLevelActionUi as they share the same HierarchyPrincipal things.
